description: Scan decimal expansion of zeta(3) until all n-digit strings have been seen; a(n) is last string seen.
links: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Apery's Constant
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Constant Digit Scanning
crossrefs: Cf. A036906 (number of decimal digits of zeta(3) that must be scanned to see all n-digit strings).
author: _Michael Kleber_
